## Installation

If the `devtools` package is not yet installed, install it first:
```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages('devtools')
library(devtools)
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install lcra from Github:
install_github('umich-biostatistics/SBLF') 
library(SBLF)
```
